title: Tango Seduction Secrets - James Marshall interviews Yuyu - Part 3
description:
Want to discover the principles of Natural Seduction that were hinted at in this video? 
Click here: https://www.thenaturallifestyles.com/product-inquiry/

This interview was lying around on a dusty hard drive, all forgotten until a few weeks ago - But once I discovered it, I knew that this interview would be invaluable to any man trying to better his skills with women.

Listen closely to what Yuyu says, gentlemen. In all the seduction/pickup gurus I've met, Yuyu understands the dynamics between a man and a woman in a way that's both insightful and enlightening.

-James
